title: QueVADIS
text: Colonization differences among coexisting oaks: from acorn properties and dispersal to facilitation - Diferencias de colonización de quercíneas coexistentes: desde las propiedades y la dispersión de las bellotas a la facilitación - (QueVADIS)

title: Jorge A. Martín Ávila
text: Hi! I am currently doing my PhD in the University of Alcalá. My research topic is the pest-regulation Ecosystem Service of the Asian hornet, provided by the European honey buzzard.

title: Jorge A. Martín Ávila
text:
Education
University of Alcalá, Alcalá de Henares | Madrid, ES PhD in Ecology, Biodiversity and Global Change | Dic 2020
